text: Ezɨ Jeremaia dɨkavigha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ghugha, Ikiavɨra Itir God a mɨkemezir akar kaba bar dar gun gumazamiziba bar me mɨkeme. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumaziba ko, akam inigha izir gumaziba ko, gumazamiziba bar akam baraki. Ezɨ Jeremaia mɨkemegha gɨvazɨma, ofa gamir gumaziba ko, akam inigha izir gumaziba ko, gumazamiziba bar an suigha ghaze, “Na aremegh.
